title: [PC] Grand Theft Auto : San Andreas [TadXhaM, 2012]
description:
General Information
.............................................................
  
  Product   :   Grand Theft Auto
  Version   :   San Andreas (2005)
  Developer :   Rockstar Games & Rockstar North
  Released  :   7/6/2005
  Size      :   3.92GB
  Uploader  :   TadXhaM (<a class="__cf_email__" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" data-cfemail="ccb8ada8a3e2a4ada1ada2a28caba1ada5a0e2afa3a1">[email&#160;protected]</a><script cf-hash='f9e31' type="text/javascript">
/* <![CDATA[ */!function(){try{var t="currentScript"in document?document.currentScript:function(){for(var t=document.getElementsByTagName("script"),e=t.length;e--;)if(t[e].getAttribute("cf-hash"))return t[e]}();if(t&&t.previousSibling){var e,r,n,i,c=t.previousSibling,a=c.getAttribute("data-cfemail");if(a){for(e="",r=parseInt(a.substr(0,2),16),n=2;a.length-n;n+=2)i=parseInt(a.substr(n,2),16)^r,e+=String.fromCharCode(i);e=document.createTextNode(e),c.parentNode.replaceChild(e,c)}}}catch(u){}}();/* ]]> */</script>)



 System Requirements
.............................................................
  
  System    :   Windows, PS2
  Windows   :   Win2000, WinXP, WinVista, Win7
  Processor :   1 Ghz Pentium III / AMD Athlon Processor
  Memory    :   256 MB RAM (512MB+ required)
  Mechanic  :   8x DVD-ROM, DVD Mechanic
  Space     :   3.6GB of Free Disk Space
  Graphics  :   64 MB DirectX 9 compatible Video Card
  Audio     :   DirectX 9 compatible Stereo Sound Card
  Others    :   Keyboard & Mouse



 Installation
.............................................................

  To complete following installation we'll need one of those
  programs :
  [*] WinRAR (latest) - which's able to extract .iso format
  [*] Daemon Tool - best way to complete installation.
   ... I'm using Daemon Tool.


 [1.] - Run "Daemon Tool"
      - Mount a Virtual Driver of San Andreas' .ISO file.
      - Wait untill AutoRun starts
      - Click to "Install"
      - Finish Installation
        * if they want to "Register Online" type "NO"

 [2.] - From "Crack folder" copy "gta_sa.exe".
      - Paste to your San Andreas Installation folder.
        * standard : C:/Program Files/Rockstar Games/GTA San Andreas/
      - And select "Replace" to replace old ones.

 [3.] - Enjoy playing GTA : San Andreas !


.............................................................
